title: Famous birthdays for Oct. 6: Tony Dungy, Elisabeth Shue
text:
Oct. 6 (UPI) — Those born on this date are under the sign of Libra.

They include:

— Opera singer Jenny Lind in 1820

— Inventor and manufacturer George Westinghouse in 1846

— Swiss architect Le Corbusier in 1887

— French aviator Roland Garros in 1888

— Tennis champion Helen Wills Moody in 1905

— Actor Carole Lombard in 1908

— Journalist Shana Alexander in 1925

— Former Syrian President Hafez al-Assad in 1930

— Actor Britt Ekland in 1942 (age 77)

— Northern Ireland politician Gerry Adams in 1948 (age 71)

— Television executive Leslie Moonves in 1949 (age 70)

— Football coach Tony Dungy in 1955 (age 64)

— Writer David Brin in 1950 (age 69)

— Actor Elisabeth Shue in 1963 (age 56)

— Actor Amy Jo Johnson in 1970 (age 49)

— Actor Ioan Gruffudd in 1973 (age 46)

— Actor Olivia Thirlby in 1986 (age 33)

— Rapper/actor Roshon Fegan in 1991 (age 28)

— Actor Rio Mangini in 2002 (age 17)
